FuncDef: This command allows the configuration of WRED per queue with the following options:

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an existing slope policy that is used to override the default WRED slope policy.

Specifies whether the WRED per queue is using the native FP3- and higher-based hardware WRED capabilities or pool per queue. Values-native - uses the hardware per queue WRED capabilities of the FP3- and higher-based hardware and requires slope-usage exceed-low.. ParamDefault: Default- native

Specifies congestion control to be used. Values-default - maps the inplus, in, out, and exceed-profile traffic to the highplus, high, low, and exceed WRED slopes, respectively; this is only supported for pool-per-queue mode.. ParamDefault: Default- exceed-low
